entry.tran: 惯扒窃的；好顺手牵羊的
entry.def: If you say that someone is light-fingered, you mean that they steal things.

means.word_mean: 1. having nimble fingers literally or figuratively; especially for stealing or picking pockets;

sentences.sentence: "a light-fingered burglar who can crack the combination of a bank vault"- Harry Hansen
"the light-fingered thoughtfulness...of the most civilized playwright of the era"- Time
